# Welcome to our One Team Excercise

[![N|Solid](data:image/png;base64,)](https://publicis.sapient.com)

This is a learning class for our internal usage to cover lack of knowledge, or even ramp ups in several topics. 
The main task is to rebuild the startpage http://m.lh.com
The one excercise task is about:

  - Building a frontend team 
  - see this task as a real life project
  - set up all needed team structures, as roles and responsibilities, documentations, and code conventions
  - choosing the right architecture, frameworks and convetions to reach the final aim
  
## Tech

### Requirements
* [node.js] >= 7.8.0
* [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/) >= 4.2.0

## Build Setup

``` bash
# install dependencies
npm install

# serve with hot reload at localhost:8080
npm run serve

# build for with node-env for production (API 1.0)
npm run build

# run lint
npm run lint

# run unit tests
npm run unit

# run all tests
npm test
````
### Installation

To run the project you only have to make sure, that all prerequirements are installed, and then install the project locally on your machine.

Install the dependencies and devDependencies and start the server.

```sh
$ cd one-team-excercise
$ npm install
$ npm run serve
```
### Plugins

Here should be a list of all plugins which we are using.

| Plugin | README |
| ------ | ------ |
| Github | [plugins/github/README.md][PlGh] |
